#summary Project porpose

= Project purpose =

The purpose of HDD Guardian is to provide a new graphical user interface under Windows for smartctl, a command line tool of [http://sourceforge.net/apps/trac/smartmontools/wiki SMART Monitoring Tools] project, in order to make this utility available for all Windows users.

With HDD Guardian is possible to monitor all installed HDD and SSD devices recognized by smartctl, offering the possibility to make a continuous and silent monitoring of your storage devices, placing icons into the tray area and settings the warning behavior.
